key_talking_points: Florida is maintaining a one-goal lead over Edmonton early in the first. The recent penalty called on Florida could give Edmonton an opportunity to tie the game.
The shot differential shows a lot of offensive pressure from both teams. Goalies are being tested early.
The tripping penalty was called on Sam Bennett (FLA) at 16:28 of the first period, putting the Oilers on the power play for two minutes.
